languages.text: {n}На главном мониторе когитатора что-то двигается — что-то, непохожее на код. Стоит вам приблизиться, как изображение на экране начинает скользить в разные стороны, словно кольца свернувшейся змеи. Из темноты, мелькающей между рябящими "кольцами", на вас двумя раскаленными искрами взирает нечто.{/n}

{n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На главном мониторе когитатора что-то двигается — что-то, непохожее на код. Стоит вам приблизиться, как изображение на экране начинает скользить в разные стороны, словно кольца свернувшейся змеи. Из темноты, мелькающей между рябящими "кольцами", на вас двумя раскаленными искрами взирает нечто.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Something unlike code is moving on the cogitator's main screen. When you come closer, the image starts to shift sideways like the coils of an awakened snake. Something is looking at you from the darkness between the unwinding "coils".{/n}

{n}Something unlike code is moving on the cogitator's main screen. When you come closer, the image starts to shift sideways like the coils of an awakened snake. Something is looking at you from the darkness between the unwinding "coils".{/n}

{n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

{n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

{n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者的主屏幕上有什么东西在移动，但看起来并不像是代码。当你靠近时，那个图像开始不断起伏，仿佛一条苏醒的蛇不断盘绕一样。屏幕上的圆盘不断展开，圆盘之间的黑暗中出现了两个如针尖般大小的光点——有什么东西在盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器的主屏幕上有什么东西在移动，但看起来并不像是代码。当你靠近时，那个图像开始不断起伏，仿佛一条苏醒的蛇不断盘绕一样。屏幕上的圆盘不断展开，圆盘之间的黑暗中出现了两个如针尖般大小的光点——有什么东西在盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Algo se mueve en la pantalla principal del cogitador, pero no es código. Al acercarte, la imagen empieza a ondular, como si de una serpiente se tratase. Dos puntos de luz se iluminan en la pantalla: algo te observa desde la oscuridad arremolinada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo se mueve en la pantalla principal del cogitador, pero no es código. Al acercarte, la imagen empieza a ondular, como si de una serpiente se tratase. Dos puntos de luz se iluminan en la pantalla: algo te observa desde la oscuridad arremolinada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機のメイン画面で何かが動いているが、コードではないようだ。近づいてみれば、画像が波打ってうねっている。その姿はまるで目を覚ました蛇がとぐろを巻いているようだ。画面にぽつぽつとふたつの光が表示された―ぐるぐると動くとぐろの間でちらつく暗闇から、何かがこちらを監視していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機のメイン画面で何かが動いているが、コードではないようだ。近づいてみれば、画像が波打ってうねっている。その姿はまるで目を覚ました蛇がとぐろを巻いているようだ。画面にぽつぽつとふたつの光が表示された―ぐるぐると動くとぐろの間でちらつく暗闇から、何かがこちらを監視していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etwas bewegt sich auf dem Hauptbildschirm des Cogitators, aber es sieht nicht aus wie Code. Als du dich näherst, windet sich das Bild hin und her, wie eine frisch erwachte Schlange. Zwei Lichtpunkte erscheinen auf dem Bildschirm – jemand beobachtet dich aus der Dunkelheit und flackert zwischen den Windungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas bewegt sich auf dem Hauptbildschirm des Cogitators, aber es sieht nicht aus wie Code. Als du dich näherst, windet sich das Bild hin und her, wie eine frisch erwachte Schlange. Zwei Lichtpunkte erscheinen auf dem Bildschirm – jemand beobachtet dich aus der Dunkelheit und flackert zwischen den Windungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose défile sur l'écran principal du cogitateur, mais cela ne ressemble pas à du code. Lorsque vous vous approchez, l'image se met à onduler comme un serpent qui viendrait de se réveiller. Deux points lumineux apparaissent sur l'écran : quelque chose vous observe depuis les ténèbres fluctuantes qui règnent entre les ondulations.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose défile sur l'écran principal du cogitateur, mais cela ne ressemble pas à du code. Lorsque vous vous approchez, l'image se met à onduler comme un serpent qui viendrait de se réveiller. Deux points lumineux apparaissent sur l'écran : quelque chose vous observe depuis les ténèbres fluctuantes qui règnent entre les ondulations.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın ana ekranında bir şeyler kıpırdanmakla birlikte gördüğün hiçbir koda benzemiyor. Ekrandaki imge, yaklaştığın an bir o yana, bir bu yana bükülmeye başlıyor. Uykusundan uyanmış bir yılanı anımsatıyor. Ekranda iki ışık noktacığı beliriyor, düzleşen kıvrımların karanlığının ardında birileri seni izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something is moving on the cogitator's main screen, but it doesn't look like code. When you draw closer, the image starts to undulate this way and that, like the coils of an awakened snake. Two pinpricks of light appear on the screen — something is watching you from the darkness flickering between the unwinding coils.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın ana ekranında bir şeyler kıpırdanıyor ancak gördüğün hiçbir koda benzemiyor. Ekrandaki imge, yaklaştığın an bir o yana, bir bu yana bükülmeye başlıyor. Uykusundan uyanmış bir yılanı anımsatıyor. Ekranda iki ışık noktacığı beliriyor, düzleşen kıvrımların karanlığının ardında birileri seni izliyor.{/n}
